title: Ukraine war live: Macron denies warning Ukraine about potential US betrayal
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron denied any allegations related to a leaked transcript of his conversation with Ukrainian officials. He firmly stated, "I deny everything" when questioned about the authenticity of the document. The denial comes amid ongoing discussions about France's support for Ukraine.

title: Amorim says little-used Mainoo is proof he trusts Manchester United’s academy
summary: Kobbie Mainoo has yet to start a match in the Premier League this season. Coach Ruben Amorim defended his choices, stating he aims to field the best players available. The statement suggests a strategy focused on performance rather than individual player preferences.

title: Pentagon announces another boat strike amid heightened scrutiny – US politics live
summary: Four people were killed in an attack on a boat in the eastern Pacific, raising concerns about the region's security. The incident comes amid ongoing investigations into previous strikes in the area. Authorities are under pressure to provide answers and ensure safety for maritime operations.

title: Merino may keep place as Arsenal striker, Slot wants ‘top four’ return – football live
summary: England and Scotland are set to discover their World Cup draws as the weekend approaches. Join our writers for the latest news and updates. Stay tuned for insights on what lies ahead for both teams.

title: World Cup 2026 draw: updates as the teams await fate in Washington DC – live
summary: Writers will provide updates from the draw in Washington, D.C. for the upcoming 48-team tournament scheduled for next summer. This event marks an important milestone for the tournament's organization. Stay tuned for live coverage and insights.
